titles.title: Permitting for Mining Needs Act of 2022
Permitting for Mining Needs Act of 2022
To improve the permitting process for mining on Federal land, and for other purposes.

bill.summary:
Permitting for Mining Needs Act of 2022
This bill expedites the review of mining projects on federal lands and limits judicial review of mining projects.
